string.text: Offer to help the leader of the Loners
Help the Rookie with some vodka
Talk to the commander in charge of the outpost

Everybody! Come quickly to the Duty outpost at the Garbage! There's a large herd of wild boars coming in fast from the Dark Valley! All who help us fend off and destroy these vermin will be rewarded in kind. Please help us! Now!
Help the Duty group eliminate the wild boars
Find out what Seriy knows about Strelok

Bes: Those Bandit scumbags are trying to take control of the Garbage again. About half an hour ago they attacked us, and we managed to kill three of the bastards. Some of my men have gone for reinforcements, but there's only a few of us left, and we could really use some help. If you fight with us, brother, I promise to make it worth your while...
There was a terrible fight between the Loners and the Bandits at the machinery graveyard. There'll be another attack soon, and the Loners need all the help they can get!
